CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Horizon Enterprises relative to Starlight Innovations?
SRP.A: Horizon Enterprises is {above} Starlight Innovations in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total debt to equity ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Horizon Enterprises}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total debt to equity ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starlight Innovations}.

VE.Q: What is Starlight Innovations's Debt to Equity Ratio in 1994?
VE.A: Starlight Innovations's debt to equity ratio in 1994 is {0.17} ratio.

VE.Q: What is Horizon Enterprises's Debt to Equity Ratio in 2003?
VE.A: Horizon Enterprises's debt to equity ratio in 2003 is {0.21} ratio.

VE.Q: What is Horizon Enterprises's Debt to Equity Ratio in 1996?
VE.A: Horizon Enterprises's debt to equity ratio in 1996 is {0.32} ratio.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Debt to Equity Ratio in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum debt to equity ratio is {0.03} ratio.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Debt to Equity Ratio in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum debt to equity ratio is {0.50} ratio.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Debt to Equity Ratio level recorded for Horizon Enterprises?
EVJ.A: Horizon Enterprises reached approximately {0.49} ratio in {1984}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Debt to Equity Ratio level recorded for Horizon Enterprises?
EVJ.A: Horizon Enterprises's lowest recorded level is approximately {0.10} ratio in {2011}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Debt to Equity Ratio?
SC.A: The average total debt to equity ratio is {0.47} ratio.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Debt to Equity Ratio go below 0.28 ratio? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Debt to Equity Ratio fall between 0.41 and 0.46 ratio? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Debt to Equity Ratio exceed 0.58 ratio? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1992, did the total Debt to Equity Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1989 and 2007?
NC.A: The change in total debt to equity ratio between 1987 and 1992 was {smaller} than between 1989 and 2007.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1995, was the average total Debt to Equity Ratio higher or lower than between 1994 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total debt to equity ratio between 1986 and 1995 was {higher} than between 1994 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 2006, was the average total Debt to Equity Ratio higher or lower than between 1987 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total debt to equity ratio between 1991 and 2006 was {lower} than between 1987 and 2003.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2003, did the total Debt to Equity Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1984 and 2004?
NC.A: The change in total debt to equity ratio between 1999 and 2003 was {smaller} than between 1984 and 2004.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Horizon Enterprises} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Starlight Innovations, Horizon Enterprises}.
